PixelAuction.createAuction (/unique_chucks/25/0xe5701af1d9474707cf85bf6fa31aa0f892951817.sol#513-540) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(! tokenIdToAuction[_tokenId].live) (/unique_chucks/25/0xe5701af1d9474707cf85bf6fa31aa0f892951817.sol#523-526)

PixelAuction.bid (/unique_chucks/25/0xe5701af1d9474707cf85bf6fa31aa0f892951817.sol#541-570) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(auction.endTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/25/0xe5701af1d9474707cf85bf6fa31aa0f892951817.sol#550-552)

PixelAuction.endAuction (/unique_chucks/25/0xe5701af1d9474707cf85bf6fa31aa0f892951817.sol#588-634) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(auction.endTime < block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/25/0xe5701af1d9474707cf85bf6fa31aa0f892951817.sol#611-615)

PixelBase.HEIGHT should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0xe5701af1d9474707cf85bf6fa31aa0f892951817.sol#71)
